description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Cpt. Kurky to collect powerful gems. Time is running against you, threats can approach, you need to utilize the stations architecture, find the shortest ways to the gems by using portals or opening gates with triggers. While Cpt. Kurky is narrating your doing in his special way you have to take care of the time, fuel, hull damage, stations damage, incoming threats and much more.
